Job Posting:173452 - Position: W26 Co-op/Intern UX Design 173452 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 09/24/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 09/17/2025 03:26 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Kinaxis 700 Silver Seven Road Ottawa K2V 1C3 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description Location 2026 - Winter W26 Co-op/Intern UX Design 173452 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 12 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List This is a hybrid position. You must be in the Ottawa, Canada office, at least three days a week. About the Team The UX team at Kinaxis is transforming the user experience of our core product, Maestro. You'll be integrated right into the UX team and treated like a permanent employee. You'll work closely with developers, product managers, user researchers and other designers on exciting and challenging design projects. You'll have the opportunity to experiment, learn new skills and gain valuable real-world experience. This is a full-time, 12-month position, starting January 2026. To be eligible for a Co-op or Intern position at Kinaxis, you must either be currently enrolled in full-time education or, if you are a recent/upcoming graduate, your graduation date must be within 12 months of the placement end date. What you will do • Partner with product, engineering, research, and go-to-market teams to define and build new tools and experiences from the ground up. • Lead at least one initiative and be the go-to person for design tasks, questions and feedback. • Help prototype functional UI wireframes, concept mock-ups and final, pixel-perfect designs. • Conduct lean UX research to support your design decisions. • Contribute to Kinaxis comprehensive design system PARCEL. Contribute to a high-functioning, collaborative design culture that values speed and craftsmanship. • Job Requirements What we are looking for • You have an education in Human Computer Interaction, User Interface Design, Industrial Design, or equivalent experience with a focus on software products. • Some design experience, with a portfolio of projects that showcase your design process and skills. • A creative mindset and a passion for designing modern, high-quality solutions with the help of modern design tools and AI on your side. Why you'll love this role • Design for real impact - Help shape tools used by global brands to manage complex supply chains that affect everything from medicine to smartphones. • Learn from experience - Work alongside senior designers on real product challenges, from AI-powered planning to modernizing enterprise UX for the age of Generative AI. Build your portfolio - Contribute to projects that go to market, gaining hands-on experience in discovery, prototyping, and • systems thinking. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: https://careers-kinaxis.icims.com/jobs/33696/co-op-intern-ux-design/job Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
